headline: Exelon Names Tim Peterson Chief Customer and Technology Officer
summary: CHICAGO, January 08, 2026--Exelon (Nasdaq: EXC) today announced that Tim Peterson, currently senior vice president, chief information officer and chief technology officer at Minneapolis-based Xcel Energy, will join Exelon as executive vice president and chief customer and technology officer in February.
